title: LibreRead: Self-Hosted Free(Libre) Ebook Reader
author: ak1991
content: readme.md librereadfree(libre) ebook reader coming soon. you what 'm building is promising, could sponsor development. will help continue working this software full-.features goals:self-hosted.simple setup script.privacy is primary focus.browser based, responsive design.full-text search through the ebooks find relevant content.highlight favorite content.add annotations your favorite content.group books collections.currently supports pdf files. epub support coming soon.
